name: RePear Therapy
description: You're playing as the renowned Dr. Pear, couples therapy specialist! Your job is to plant the seeds of relationships and watch them grow! This is a choose your own adventure visual novel, where the player is presented with 3 main dialogue options, Option 1, Option 2, Or Option 3 (Remaining Silent). You are trying to rePEAR the relationship of Apple & Orange, and dialogue will change base on choices that you make, so choose carefully! Try to get the best review at the end of the Therapy Sessions (5 stars)!
